# Feedback for AI

**Tag:** `cui-feedback-for-ai`  
**Category:** components  
**Source:** https://coherence-ftekb0dcfpcjb3gv.b02.azurefd.net/resources/feedback-for-ai/

## Import

```js
import '@charm-ux/cui/dist/components/feedback-for-ai/index.js'
```


> Feedback for AI

## Guidance

### Standards

- For the component to be implemented to meet basic accessibility requirements and satisfy user expectations, the following requirements must be true in your app.

### Required and optional components

- Dialog (or other trigger mechanism) – required
- Feedback modal – required
- Modal name – required
- Feedback questions/statements – required
- Text input – optional
- Character counter – optional
- Helper text – optional
- Legal disclaimer – required
- Confirmation modal – required

### Content

- The number of questions, as well as what these questions are, can be altered. When writing for a feedback modal, be sure to do the following:

### Time the trigger appropriately

- A trigger is the condition required to have the toast/modal sequence appear. When deciding on your sampling criteria, time the trigger to achieve at least 300 monthly responses to achieve reliable results with 90% confidence and a 5% margin of error.

### Adopt recommended AI queries

- The results provided by [Copilot] are accurate and relevant
- Using [Copilot] saves me time while I’m trying to accomplish my goals
- I would be disappointed if I could no longer use [Copilot] in [product]
- (Optional) What, if anything, do you find frustrating or unappealing about [Copilot] in [product]?

### Provide feedback

- Reach out to us if you spot a bug or have a feature request. Your feedback is critical to the success of Coherence and everyone who uses it.
- Contact us on Teams
